thread.section_title: California Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of California Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: debjane
title: Great location
text:
We chose this hotel because of the location and breakfast.We took the train from the airport to termini station and it took a few minutes walk to get to the California which is very convenient.The hotel is just off the main road and has nearby shops supermarkets restaurants and trams and buses.To be honest you can walk to almost all the main attractions and more it is faster than waiting for transport by the time a bus arrives you can already get to your destination.The California has a hot and cold basic breakfast which is fine to start the day on and it is fresh every day.The rooms are clean and comfortable and have been refurbished.The staff at the California were very pleasant too.I would definitely stay at the California again it met all our requirements.
Room Tip: Corner rooms are larger but the wifi connection is poor See more room tips
